install.name: Authentication - WikidAuth
install.author: OSTLabs Inc
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2010 OSTLabs Inc. All rights reserved.
install.description: Handles user authentication with the Wikid Authentication System

param.name: server_port
param.label: Wikid Server Port
param.description: The port the Wikid Server's WAUTH listener is on. Default: 8388

param.name: client_key_file
param.label: Client key file location
param.description: The location of the client key file on the web servers drive.

param.name: client_key_pass
param.label: Client key file passcode
param.description: The passphrase for the client key file.

param.name: domaincode
param.label: Domain Code
param.description: The assigned domain code on the Wikid Server
